course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Numerical Simulation of Wind Bands on Gaseous Planets
course.description: Using numerical simulations, the physical conditions that determine the equatorial wind direction, band width, and number of wind bands on the gaseous planet are studied. The transformed spectral method is used to solve the compressible hydrodynamics equation. Students should seek instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2023 AND MATH 2121 AND PHYS 3032 AND PHYS 4050
